name: [EXPTUSLO] filler stopped synchronizing ES search index [TF]
description: Check for unexpired snapshots has not successfully run.  ## Consequences If this condition persists, it could lead to DFQ searches not returning correct results  ## Remediation - Check ElasticSearch cluster load. - Check `filler` logs.
